channel.title: SQL on NS News and Views
channel.description: Recent content in SQL on NS News and Views

item.title: Power BI + iSAMS API
item.description: Like many people, I’ve tinkered with Power BI over the years but have never really dug deep into the weeds; the same can also be said for the iSAMS REST API. So recently I thought why not combine these two systems and see what can be achieved?

item.title: How to get the latest student photo from iSAMS
item.description: It’s been eight months since my last blog post, having taken on a new job, been on the receiving end of a full-on enterprise ransomware attack (that wasn’t nice!) and quite frankly experiencing one heck of a baptism of fire - I felt it was time do write a quick blog post tip!
